item.description:
Tonight, explore experiences and relationships 
from other lives while learning about strengths 
and weaknesses that you have brought forward 
with you. Accessing these deeply held memories 
leads to an adventure of endless exploration 
into your innermost self.

During this 2 hour Meetup, we will first have 
a group discussion, then a group hypnosis 
regression, then time to process our discoveries.

Payment may be made through PayPal or by 
cash or check. Contact Kathryn at the number 
provided with any questions.

Preregistration required, as space is limited.

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: HYPNOSIS SEMINAR : Past Life Regression Mar 22
